mapper.insert: insert into product (SiteName, Type, ProductCodeList, ITEM, CutSize, Quantity, WindowSET, SingleMiddle, Weight, WindowNumber, Image) values(#{SiteName}, #{Type}, #{ProductCodeList}, #{ITEM}, #{CutSize}, #{Quantity} , #{WindowSET}, #{SingleMiddle}, #{Weight}, #{WindowNumber}, #{StrImage})
mapper.select: select idx, SiteName, Type, ProductCodeList, ITEM, CutSize, Quantity, WindowSET, SingleMiddle, Weight, WindowNumber, Image as 'StrImage' from product order by idx
